body: We support hierarchical objects that can be considered as trees. `COMPLEX_OBJ` and `WRAPPED_OBJ` are inner nodes, when all other types are leaves. The `schema`, `output types` and `shapes` are represents only leaves. So, `COMPLEX_OBJ` and `WRAPPED_OBJ` just can't appear here.
body_html: We support hierarchical objects that can be considered as trees. COMPLEX_OBJ and WRAPPED_OBJ are inner nodes, when all other types are leaves. The schema, output types and shapes are represents only leaves. So, COMPLEX_OBJ and WRAPPED_OBJ just can't appear here.
body_text: We support hierarchical objects that can be considered as trees. COMPLEX_OBJ and WRAPPED_OBJ are inner nodes, when all other types are leaves. The schema, output types and shapes are represents only leaves. So, COMPLEX_OBJ and WRAPPED_OBJ just can't appear here.
